title: HELP ME - Cannot get a return shipping label sent to new email address!!!
content:
I purchased my phone and the warranty protection plan with an old work email address which no longer exists. When I put in a claim with Assurant I noted the change in emails and asked them to send all communication, including the return shipping label, to my new email address.  This did not happen.  I chatted with Google Support for over there hours and have emailed back and forth with support nearly a dozen times and they are somehow unable to re-associate my account with a new email address and send me a return shipping label.  Now Assurant is threatening to charge me "up to $2,000" for an unreturned equipment fee.  

Google Support points me back to Assurant to get a shipping label, and Assurant then tells me that they can only come from Google, and back and forth and I'm completely stuck.  This is insane.

Why is Google unable to get a return shipping label to me to a new email address?  Am I the first person in the history of Google to change emails?  I don't understand why nobody will help me.
